about.title: About me
about.description: I have 3 years of experience in frontend development, with expertise in both freelancing and office environments. This experience allows me to quickly establish rapport with different clients and teams. I always strive to understand the client's needs and achieve high-quality results. I am committed to building long-term and mutually beneficial relationships.
